* A method to print a message to show the task that has been successfully added to the list.
* @param task task added to items list

System.out.println("Please add a description and/or date for your event!");

System.out.println("Please enter a numeric character to mark your task as done!");
* A subclass of Exception that deals with Duke-specific exceptions.
* @param message Error message to be displayed.
* A method to return the string representation of this Exception.
* A subclass of Task with scheduled date.
* @param at scheduled date of the event

* @return String representation of the Event Object.
* A class to represent a task to be done.

* @param description description of the task item
* A method to display if the task has been done.
* @return "X" for a completed task; " " for an incomplete one.
return (isDone ? "X" : " "); // mark done task with X
